author: phabc
content: For an EIP's motivation section, should it include rationale for why certain things were omitted from alternative EIP proposals? Or does that below in a discussion?

author: sky.cactus
content: That is good content for the Rationale section.

author: sky.cactus
content: The motivation is "why is this generally a useful thing", the rationale is "why were specific decisions/trade-offs made".

author: killari.
content: Python does not sound like to be the best reference implementation language because it doesn't have typing. Will the implementation have some checks for types?

author: samwilsn
content: Yep! We use mypy to do static type checking. You can see more at https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/tree/master/src/ethereum
